article_title: I Will Support The Fair Tax When Its Backers Tell The Truth

article_metadata.author: Jeffrey Dorfman

og.description: The Fair Tax is a serious tax reform proposal with much to recommend it. If its proponents would get a few more facts straight and admit some people will pay more under their system, I could support it.
